llamar
  • Reference

Reference version 0.1

All functions

check_font replace_font

Checks font is installed in the system

convert01

Recoding and cleaning of survey data

copy4facet

copy for facetting

fcs_heatmap

Plot food consumption scores by region

round_mean round_std percent round_exact

Simple reusable functions to format numbers

loadPkgs

Load commonly used functions

map_colour_text

Modifies a data frame to determine color to overlay on a colored background

multiplot

Multiple plot function

plot_avg_dot

Plot a dot plot after averaging the values

plot_bump

Plot a bump chart / slope graph

plot_color_palette

Colors: internal colors based on RColorBrewer, Viridis, Vega and Tableau colors From https://github.com/vega/vega/wiki/Scales

plot_dot_diff

Plots a dot plot

plot_dot

Plot a dot plot, either with or without lollipop sticks

plot_heatmap

Calculate and plot a correlation matrix.

plot_n

Plots the sample size across a given variable.

plot_relationships

Plot relationships between variables in a model

save_plot

Simple wrapper to ggsave

scale_colour_text

Map text annotation color to underlying value

set_aesthetics theme_blank theme_facet theme_stroke theme_xaxis theme_yaxis theme_xlab theme_ylab theme_xylab theme_xgrid theme_ygrid theme_xygrid theme_basic

Customized ggplot themes
